general.name: Chris Miller
general.summary: Web developer with the ability to easily adapt to my surroundings. Experienced in building responsive web pages, as well as dynamic web pages built from JSON files allowing for quick and easy updates. Possesses a strong passion for learning and applying new ideas and techniques coupled with an insatiable thirst for knowledge, there is no obstacle in the universe that can not be overcome. Fascinated by outer space and the unseen wonders it contains.

work.summary: Working as a contractor, I built various webpages to assist in meeting their site launch deadline. My responsibilities included building webpages from Sketch mockups while insuring their responsive design.

Main duties included building, maintaining, and updating product landing pages, as well as various informational pages. Additional responsiblities included: building and scheduling semiweekly updates to our website storefront; various site CSS fixes, and assisting other teams with any website related projects.
highlights: faq page - Built a faq page for customer use as well as internal use
staples store list - a listing of staples stores that carry our products
downloads page a showcase of downloadable verisons of our designs
press page a showcase of Erin Condren press features

work.summary: Various graphic design and web development projects, also designed web and print ad campaigns. Primarily used Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, some work with JavaScript and CSS.
highlights: designed promotional images for use around the resort
golf course image galleries web page
national advertising campaigns featured in USA Today.
